name: Treasure Jewels!
description:
Link the matching jewels together and win!
100% FREE --> DOWNLOAD NOW!

• Five different level types provide endless variety!
• To start, you'll have to gather certain colors of Jewels.
• Later, you'll need to clear away rocks that get in your way, or figure out how to guide the special Purple jewels to the bottom of the board.
• And did we mention the gold coins that sometimes hide behind the jewels, or the challenge of gathering up groups of 5 or 6 or more jewels at a time!

• Easy and fun to pick up and play anytime!
• Beautiful graphics and soothing sounds...

• Endless levels to challenge you!
• No timer, so you can take your time and relax

• Beautiful graphics!
• Intuitive touch controls!

• Compete against your friends and against everyone worldwide for the highest scores on Game Center

• Your progress is automatically saved, all the time, so go ahead and take that call or jump out to any other apps - you can come back and pick up playing right where you left off!

• Sounds can be disabled if you want a quiet game
• You can even listen to your own music while you play

Thanks for playing!
Search for "Boy Howdy" to see all our free games!
